item.title: The Road to GraphQL
item.description: The central theme of this book is GraphQL in modern applications. While GraphQL is only a specification that can be used in many programming languages, this book focuses on GraphQL in JavaScript. Facebook--the company behind the GraphQL--didn'tâ€¦
